summary: A diffusion pipeline that performs image‑to‑image generation with Stable Diffusion XL, incorporating ControlNet conditioning and optional adapters (LoRA, IP‑Adapter) to steer the denoising process based on both visual control inputs and textual prompts.
business_intent: Provide a flexible, high‑quality tool for developers and creators to generate or edit images with precise control, supporting use‑cases such as artistic content creation, visual prototyping, advertising, and any application requiring guided image synthesis.
